title: What can I do?
content:
Select a folder to activate usable buttons.
Do not upload files directly to Owned folder. Instead, open the Owned folder and create sub-folders in Owned to hold your files for each project.
Within a sub-folder, you can either upload files by first selecting the type of file to be uploaded, or you can create new files for Text Capture by clicking on Create Input for Text Capture button.
Each project should have a folder, do not mix files and sub-folders in one folder.
